// http://www.codechef.com/problems/RUBIX4/
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int min, n, c, a[51], t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
			scanf("%d",&n);
			for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
				scanf("%d",&a[i]);
			min = 50;
			for (int k=0; k<n; ++k) 
			{
            c = 0;
            for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
            {
                if (a[i] != a[k] - k + i) ++c;
                if (c >= min) break;
            }

            if (c < min) min = c;

        }
        cout << min << endl;
	}	
	return 0;
}
